decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (10807-1-01, 10807-1-02, 10807-1-03. Received: 19/09/2014. 10807-1-02, 10807-1-04. Received: 11/09/2014) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 2 - The premises shall be used for offices and for no other purpose (including any other purpose in Class B1 of the Schedule to the Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1987, or in any provision equivalent to that Class in any statutory instrument revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification).

Condition : 3 - Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 1995 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification) the building shall only be used within Use Class B1(a).
description: Variation of Condition 4 (Approved Use) of 01128/F/P7 dated 23/12/2010 to allow the change of use from (D1) Non Residential Institution to (B1) Offices use for building P
